mapper.select: SELECT qb.*, qc.name AS categoryName FROM question_board qb JOIN question_category qc ON qb.que_i_cd = qc.que_cd WHERE ur_id=#{ur_id} ORDER BY r_date DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM question_board WHERE no = #{no} and ur_id=#{ur_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question_board (ur_id, q_s_cd, que_i_cd, title, contents, r_date, m_date, ad_id, ad_name,ans_contents, ans_p_date, ans_m_date, ans_sat, state, first_date, first_id) VALUES (#{ur_id}, #{q_s_cd}, #{que_i_cd}, #{title}, #{contents}, now(), null, null, null, null, null, null, null, 'Y', now(), #{first_id})
